channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report E-2024060499
item.description:
Report E-2024060499

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-20
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material impacted the concrete terminal floor that released from one (1) 1-gallon plastic pail due to a forklift puncture. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area. The damaged plastic pail and cleanup debris was containerized into one (1) 5-gallon poly pail. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024061145
item.description:
Report X-2024061145

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-20T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-05
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KY, ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A SINGLE FIVE GALLON JERRICAN WITH ORGANIC PEROXIDE (5.2) AND CORROSIVE (8) DIAMOND LABELS. THE UN SPECIFICATION 3H1 JERRICAN LEAKED 4.5 GALLONS FROM THE CLOSURE WHICH WAS NOT SEALED. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER FIBERBOARD BOX. THERE ARE NO ORIENTATION ARROWS ON THE OUTER FIBERBOARD BOX. UN SPECIFICATION MARKS ON THE INNER JERRICAN ARE 3H1/Y14/100/221/USA/+AA4752 WITH VENTED CAP. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER EK2706, FL LABS, 301 S MISSOURI AVE, CLEARWATER FL 33756-5833.
